author: Markus Spring
content:
Breaking the rules sometimes is the way for new perception, as in this case. The stage like effect of snowy grassland and trees is great, and the diagonal offers a strong bond to the middleground.
Re. "developing" such exposed-to-the-right raws, I have made good experiences with lightzone, and if it was not such a slow tool, it would be my gold standard converter (of course, under linux, choices are not that numerous).
